abstract: Style Q&A with Italian fashion designer Donatella Versace, who discusses her typical daily routine and inspirations for her designs and work space.
lead_paragraph: In Donatella Versace’s work space in Milan, the walls are white, mistakes yield progress, and the table is “scary.”

headline.main: Donatella Versace Keeps Things in Proportion
headline.print_headline: Donatella Versace Keeps Things in Proportion

snippet: In Donatella Versace’s work space in Milan, the walls are white, mistakes yield progress, and the table is “scary.”
